name: Terran Logistics Mainframe
description:
This is a small 2d idle game I made in like 3 hours for the StarCraft Game Jam... it's very lame. (But I plan to improve it with next updates as I keep learning)

Starcraft is Blizzard's Copyright. All rights belong to them.

You are in charge of the local Terran Logistics Mainframe and you have to meet your daily Marine quota before the day is over. Mine yourself or build SCVs to mine enough materials to equip your marines that will fight for the Greater Terran Dominion. You got an important duty, Officer, we expect you to work hard.
